title: Never Push and Never Pull
description: This short-story is a glimpse into the life of a special education teacher and the special needs students she grows to love. How does she approach a child with autism who is uncommunicative? What happens to change Cara's life? Cindy Stringer Wismer, teacher and author, shares this heart-felt, often humorous tale to the delight of readers everywhere.
author: Cindy Stringer Wismer
